blogPost.excerpt: Premast Plus helps 10k users design presentations using PowerPoint and now we are looking forward to enabling them & more people to manage, share and create branded content with our new stunning features. A plugin and web app that gives you the ultimate access
blogPost.body: Premast Plus helps 10k users design presentations using PowerPoint and now we are looking forward to enabling them & more people to manage, share and create branded content with our new stunning features. A plugin and web app that gives you the ultimate access
blogPost.title: Premast Plus 2.0 - Design professionally branded Powerpoint presentations
blogPost.author: Samir Soliman

localize.description: Premast Plus帮助1万名用户使用PowerPoint设计演示文稿，现在我们期待通过我们的新功能让他们和更多人能够管理、分享和创建品牌内容。一款插件和网络应用，让你能够最终访问。
localize.tagline: 设计专业品牌的Powerpoint演示文稿

localize.description: Premast Plus幫助1萬名用戶使用PowerPoint設計演示文稿，現在我們期待通過我們的新功能讓他們和更多人能夠管理、分享和創建品牌內容。一款插件和網絡應用，讓你能夠最終訪問。
localize.tagline: 設計專業品牌的Powerpoint演示文稿

previous.excerpt: Click2Contact helps visitors connect with sellers with a single tap connecting with customer where they connect. [Giveaway 🎉] Comment how it can help your bussiness & get a 50% off just comment and send screenshot to sanskar@click2contact.app.
previous.title: Click2Contact - Connecting visitors to businesses with a single tap

localize.description: Click2Contact帮助访客与卖家建立联系，只需轻点一下就能与客户建立联系。[赠品🎉] 评论它如何帮助你的业务，并获得50％的折扣，只需评论并发送截图到 sanskar@click2contact.app。
Click2Contact幫助訪客與賣家建立聯繫，只需輕點一下就能與客戶建立聯繫。[贈品🎉] 評論它如何幫助你的業務，並獲得50％的折扣，只需評論併發送截圖到 sanskar@click2contact.app。

next.excerpt: https://burnrate.fyi is a SaaS expense estimator designed with ease-of-use in mind. In three easy steps you can choose the products or services you want, configure them, and see your expected burnrate at the end of each month.
next.title: burnrate.fyi - Estimate your SaaS expenses in 5 minutes for free

localize.description: https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS费用估算器，设计时考虑到了易用性。在三个简单的步骤中，你可以选择你想要的产品或服务，配置它们，并在每个月末看到你的预期燃烧率。
https://burnrate.fyi 是一款SaaS費用估算器，設計時考慮到了易用性。在三個簡單的步驟中，你可以選擇你想要的產品或服務，配置它們，並在每個月末看到你的預期燃燒率。
